name: Bumpkin Berserker
description:
Game Overview

Play as a farmer named Bumpkin, growing and collecting crops on his farm. At the same time, fend off alien invaders trying to harvest your crops.

Controls

Move - WASD

Shotgun - Left Click

Chain Hook - Right Click

Credits
